content: "The prosperity of an area's flora is largely dependent on its biodiversity" - I came across this in a gardening manual.
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Lost souls,
Drift aimlessly by attaching themselves to butterflies,
And when they encounter beings of greater vitality, they become entangled with them.
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content: Let them be~ Who knows? They might end up loving it!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Yeep~ You caught me!
I'm actually not very good at catching butterflies,
Well then, I suppose I shall try a few more times.
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
It's been so long since I last caught butterflies,
I've completely forgotten how to do it.
Yee~ Would you mind helping me catch one?
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content: You might want to observe the butterflies as well.
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
Yesterday I came across this book "Top 10 Techniques to Stop Sneezing,"
and I learned quite a remarkable method!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
For some reason, with just a single glance,
whether it's squirrels or butterflies,
they all swiftly flee from my sight.
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, would you help me
catch some butterflies? I need them
for mask inspiration.
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
What must I do,
to grasp my own unique fighting style, just as they have?
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
I've discovered why my plants never thrive~
The reason is...
Their Bond Lv. with insects is far too low!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content: How fascinating! Allow me to assist you.
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Thank you, I'm counting on you for this experiment!
I hope the techniques from the book will work.
How mysterious~
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Even butterflies of the same species, when examined closely,
have subtle differences in their colors and patterns,
like nature's own masquerade masks!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
<size=64>I don't understand! It's completely incomprehensible!</size>
How can a martial arts master develop
a unique fighting style just by observing butterflies?
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content: You... just you wait!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Actually, it's vitality attracting each other,
though in certain cultures,
they call it "haunting" or "possession."
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content: Why yes, I'd be delighted!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content: Yee~ Catching butterflies is quite delightful! You should try it more often.
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content: Yip~ Would you like to try it yourself?
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
The butterfly has vanished.
To prevent our Neighbors from being frightened by any "haunting,"
please bring me any <color=#8AAB4B>butterflies</color> you encounter so we may investigate them systematically.
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Really?!
I'm truly grateful, Manna!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Thank you, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>,
I don't want you to work too hard,
Just one is enough, how lovely~
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Indeed, that's precisely the logic.
It seems I haven't been diligent enough!
I shall redouble my efforts at once!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Like them? Why...
Indeed, the person who opened the bottle
Must be among those who like it. I shall investigate this.
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Oh my, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, there you are.
How fortunate, I've been rather troubled.
About butterflies...
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
So I'd like to catch some insects to release in my courtyard,
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>, would you be willing to help me?
I'm really... not very good at this sort of thing.
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Oh, I should mention,
I brought back some questionable butterfly specimens as usual,
but when I went to examine them, I noticed someone had opened the container.
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
<color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>...
Do you have a moment?
As it is widely known, butterflies are creatures of mystical nature.
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content: Practice makes perfect~ With enough dedication, you'll master it in no time!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Well then, I'll leave it to you!
A mask inspired by butterflies...
Just thinking about it is absolutely fascinating!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
I'll leave it to you then!
<color=#695c3a>What kind of magic is this from the Mobai School? It's quite useful.</color>
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content: Yeep~ I'll help you catch butterflies!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_
幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Ah, trying to provoke me, are you?
Yeep~ Very well, I shall capture at least eight or ten of them!
Time to throw caution to the wind!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Perhaps this could help cure
my butterfly wing allergy~
But how does one catch a butterfly...
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Oh please, kind soul,
Would you catch a butterfly for me?
<color=#695c3a>This must be what Mobai meant by the proper way to make requests.</color>
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content: Yee~ Let me catch a butterfly to inspire you!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Yip~ Very well, I shall wait.
I will investigate who opened that bottle.
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content: Leave it to me, I'll catch it for you!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content: Yip~ Go catch it yourself!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Alright then, I shall give it a try myself.
Gathering inspiration is also part of mask-making, indeed!
Time to grab my insect net and search for my little "inspirations"!
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_

content:
Hmm, {短暂停}I suppose you're right.
I'll keep working hard then,
I won't take up any more of your time, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>.
info: 幻雪日常委托-发布虫任务_
